name: Boop a Beast
description:
Description

Boop a Beast is a free 3D clicker for windows and possibly Mac with all of the graphics self made. This game is made for the "My First Game Jam".

Programs used = Unity3D, Blender, Gimp2

Update

I have added some textures to the animal changing screen and fixed a material bug that I had overlooked, the dog animations have not been added due to difficulties and lack of interest after the jam was over.

This will be the first and last update as I only wanted to make a quick game for the game jam. I only wanted to tie up a few lose ends.
